CustomField.description: Annual License payments with annual license sales tax - field for quote doc purposes
CustomField.formula: ROUND( IF( AND( SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c > 12,SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c < 24), Monthly_License_with_Tax__c * (SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c - 12), IF( ISBLANK(Shipping_Address_NEW__c), Estimated_Annual_Payment__c, Estimated_Annual_Payment__c + Annual_License_Sales_Tax__c)) , 2)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Recurring annual payment for licenses. Does not include tax if shipping address is blank.
CustomField.label: Annual License With Tax
